channel.title: Suggest me melee training spot
channel.description:
I'm going for 99 strength, but I don't really know where I should train, I've tried the following spots but I don't like them: -Dagannoths(Good profit, around 70k/h with max str bonus and sara sword, but not really a great spot cause of cannons which lower your xp/h to 30-40k/h) -Bandits(around 50k/h, sucks ass and is usually crowded, and when you find a world some douche comes to ruin your day) -Monkey Guards(80k/h, I died and lost ~10m, guards blocked my way to pray altar, so I don't like this spot)
I can't do: -Armoured Zombies
I've tried googling around and ending up with same answer, Armoured Zombies, but I really cba to do tons of quests to get there.
Stats: Attack 78, Strength 94, Defense 72, Prayer 53. Gear: Full Bandos, Sara sword, Berserker ring.
Suggest me a good spot to train, others can use this thread to ask for training spot aswell.

item.title: Suggest me melee training spot
item.dc:creator: @SCFTW SCFTW
item.description:
@SCFTW wrote:

Bandits, dagannoths.

Also here’s a guide:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CofZ5Q5zgKE[/youtube]

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest me melee training spot
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

ranger squad:

No, i just speak English. “Suggest me” would mean “put me forward as a suggestion”. If you said “suggest to me”, that would mean “tell me a suggestion”.

Everyone knows what I meant, and that’s all that matters.

I intended this thread to be used by others too, that’s why I used that impression.

Every time I’ve seen you make a post, it has either been retarded or you’re trying to act cool/smartass. In my eyes, you’re just a retarded kid who wants attention.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest me melee training spot
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:15, topic:460095”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=563010.msg4104449#msg4104449 date=1347821185]

If you want good experience, you need to get there. What’s bad about spending 1-2 days doing quests?

The amount of skills I have to train, I love doing quests, the only part of the game which I actually enjoy.
[/quote]

Well what’s your ultimate goal in RS? For me, maxing out my account is essentially the best I can get. So if I want to train a certain skill, but I need to train a lot of other skills to optimize training that one, I will train the others. It all goes to the same place eventually, after all.

Just my 2c. :P[/quote]

Mine is to have a mask set

Read full topic

If you want good experience, you need to get there. What’s bad about spending 1-2 days doing quests?
[/quote]
The amount of skills I have to train, I love doing quests, the only part of the game which I actually enjoy.[/quote]

Well what’s your ultimate goal in RS? For me, maxing out my account is essentially the best I can get. So if I want to train a certain skill, but I need to train a lot of other skills to optimize training that one, I will train the others. It all goes to the same place eventually, after all.

Just my 2c.

item.description:

I’m looking for something close to 100k/h, for anything below that, I can just do dagannoths, since they are the best option so far.
